title: LFP Casual aram!
body:
Hi all,

I enjoy ARAM and having a few games every now and then due to busy lifestyle. Keen to play with anyone and everyone - not too serious and won't rage. 

Feel free to add and invite, would love to play with more of the LoL community rather than just solo q.

replies.body: If it wasn't for URF now, i'd be mostly playing ARAM, added :)

>Feel free to add and invite, would love to play with more of the LoL community rather than just solo q.

It's kinda ironic that you end up playing with more of the lol community in solo Q over being in queue with other people.
It's more enjoyable with others isn't it.
